forecasting and shrinking tail scheduling (same as Argoverse-HD), for a fair comparison (Row 1, 
Static policy). We also compare by augmenting Streamer with AdaScale [11] (Row 2, dynamic-
offline) wherein the image scale is dynamically changed using the scale metric they have proposed, 
and to compensate for the real-time scheduling issues that would arise by changing scale dynamically, 
we employ the Modified Shrinking Tail Scheduling policy.
